name: ado-comment-task
description: Azure DevOps Pipeline Task that posts an Open workspace comment on new work items

scripts.vsix: pnpm build && node scripts/assemble.mjs && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json
scripts.publish:marketplace: pnpm build && node scripts/assemble.mjs && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --token $MARKETPLACE_TOKEN
